00034 def MetricsInbreeding(self):
00035     if hasattr(self,'_pedigree'):
00036         self._inbreeding = pyp_nrm.inbreeding(self._pedigree)
00037         self.textbox.Clear()
00038         #print pyp_io.summary_inbreeding(self._inbreeding['metadata'])
00039         self.textbox.AppendText(pyp_io.summary_inbreeding(self._inbreeding['metadata']))
00040     else:
00041         pyp_gui_graphs.PyPedalShowErrorDialog(self,sedTitle='Calculate inbreeding', sedMessage='This calculation cannot be displayed because you have not yet loaded a pedigree!')
00042 
00043 def MetricsEffectiveFounders(self):
00044     if hasattr(self,'_pedigree'):
00045         self._inbreeding = pyp_nrm.inbreeding(self._pedigree)
00046         self.textbox.Clear()
00047         print pyp_io.summary_inbreeding(self._inbreeding['metadata'])
00048         self.textbox.AppendText(pyp_io.summary_inbreeding(self._inbreeding['metadata']))
00049     else:
00050         pyp_gui_graphs.PyPedalShowErrorDialog(self,sedTitle='Calculate effective founder', sedMessage='This calculation cannot be displayed because you have not yet loaded a pedigree!')
